ygData.subject: Deduplication in Heritrix-3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I am using Heritrix-3.1.1 Snapshot release. I have enabled the deduplication feature. I first mirrored a site and got about 270 pages. Now I relaunched

Hello,
 
      I am using Heritrix-3.1.1 Snapshot release. 

I have enabled=
 the deduplication feature. I first mirrored a site and got about 270 pages=
.

Now I relaunched the job. Heritrix just checked for the seed url. It fou=
nd there was no modification in it and hence it did not check the other pag=
es in the site for updates.

Is this the expected behaviour in deduplicatio=
n?

As a workaround I  pulled all the links from the crawl.log and populate=
d them in seeds.txt. It then checked the other pages as well.

Is there any=
 other way of getting around this problem?

Thanks,
Sriram Varahan.
